reviews.review_msg: Dr.Sun is not a terrible prof. The only thing that wasn't good was when she didn't go over calculations but rather said "look at the slides after class, the calculations are very logical". Exams were fair. Know how to solve homework questions and iclicker questions for exams. This class isn't easy by any means - regardless of which prof teaches it.
Just avoid it for god's sake. I am teaching everything to myself now before final because lectures were absolutely useless and nothing taught properly.

yeah if u have the chance to take a class w/ bing im tellin you to hold off till there is another prof teaching the class. be prepared to learn the material on ur own. nothing is clear about her way of teaching. also there is no room to even ask for extra explanation without her getting upset. its truly sad that sfu is allowing her ways of teaching

she was the worst prof I've ever had. She was never available not even 10 minutes after class. The lectures are copied down from textbook and homework solutions directly from the solution manual. She did not even bother typing the solutions, instead took screenshots from mannual. Very rude and negative.

Genuinely hated every minute of this class. She took an interesting topic and made me never wanna look at it again. So incredibly disorganized! Youre just paying money to take a course to fully teach yourself and get the biggest headache in the process.
